title: 47 Gifts for Men Under $50 That They’ll Actually Use
description: From cameras to cookware, these budget-friendly picks are sure to impress
author: Erika Owen, Jack Byram
excerpt: From cameras to cookware, our budget-friendly ideas for the best gifts for men under $50 are sure to impress
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Believe it or not, it is possible to find unique gifts for men under $50. Whether he has expensive taste or an endless list of stocking stuffer requests during the holidays, we’ve rounded up a list of budget-friendly gifts that can speak to everything from his hobbies to sense of style. And most importantly, these presents are designed to make the guys in your life feel special—no matter the occasion.What are some of our suggestions, you ask? We’ve included everything from cookware to help foodies nail their next recipe to beanies for all of his bad hair days. And as experts in all things home, we couldn’t help but add some gifts that design enthusiasts will appreciate, from vintage-inspired record players for traditionalists to sleek phone chargers that’ll fit in any modern home.Remember: It really is the thought that counts, so know that any gift you shop with him in mind will make all the difference. So, skip the gift cards this season and put all of your confidence in being the person who always gives the cool gift. Here are our 47 favorite gifts for men under $50 to buy now.1/46Granitestone Nonstick Square Grill PanSelf-proclaimed grill masters can fine-tune their skills year round with the help of this grill pan. Its three layers of food-grade granite are manufactured to give the pan extra durability, while the mineral coating is made to keep his BBQ from sticking.2/46Made In Tabletop Coffee Mugs Red Rim (Four-Pack)Help him fill his cup (literally) with these durable coffee mugs. He can take in his morning brew with ease thanks to this stoneware set’s ergonomic handle for easy holding and stain- and chip-resistant design for lasting use.3/46Scotch Porter Conditioning Beard Balm and Beard ConditionerOur guess is that if he has a beard, he's constantly grooming it to keep it in its best shape. This balm and conditioner duo can help streamline the process with ingredients like aloe vera and marshmallow root formulated to keep the hair clean and hydrated.4/46Noah Unisex Core Logo BeanieGrant him the gift of effortless style every time he rocks this knit beanie. Available in a few bright and neutral colors, get it for the guy who can’t be bothered with a bad hair day.5/46TRUFF Hot Sauce and Hotter Sauce 2-Pack BundleSpice up his life: Truff's hot and hotter sauces are filled with flavor and heat. With a mix between ripe red peppers and black truffle, this two-bottle gift set is the perfect sampler if he's looking to expand his condiment palate.6/46Cotsoco Vinyl Record PlayerYes, we can listen to music on our phones, but there's nothing like the sound quality of vinyls on a record player. Gift a music lover with this vintage-inspired version, which also comes with bluetooth capabilities to stream music through its built-in speaker. Bonus: You can also browse Amazon's record store to shop vinyls from his favorite artists.7/46Ceylon Gel Body WashYou can’t beat the basics, and this body wash offers just that for his self-care routine. It features ingredients like lavender extracts that are formulated to gently clean his skin without drying it out.8/46Copper Cow Coffee Vietnamese Pour Over Coffee and Milk CreamerIf your giftee already has his coffee rituals down, help them mix things up with this pack of pour-over coffee. They’ll receive a dose of three coffee flavors (classic, vanilla, and salted caramel) along with a pack of condensed milk creamers. And, hey, you might even turn them on to a new favorite.9/46Quince Italian Leather Money-Clip WalletFor the guy whose wallet is looking a little worse for wear, this practical, yet elevated gift will come in handy. This Italian leather wallet is designed to hold cash and up to eight credit cards with several front and internal pockets.10/46JBL Clip 3 Bluetooth SpeakerThis gadget is the perfect gift for the guy who has a playlist for everything: the shower, backyard hangs, reading sessions, and cooking dinner. A carabiner-style clip makes it easy to attach just about anywhere.11/46Foosball Bottle Opener KeychainThere’s a good chance he’s played a (likely buzzed) game of foosball at some point in his life. This is one of those rare finds that’s good for gifting to someone you don’t know entirely well. After all, there’s never a bottle opener around when you really need one—and this is an adorable reinforcement.12/46Courant Catch:1 Wireless Charging PadWireless chargers are often clunky and, well, a little bit ugly. Courant has cracked the code when it comes to charging tech that looks as sleek as your iPhone. This particular design comes in eight colors, including three Belgian linen finishes and five leather options—though the latter will break your $50 budget by a bit.13/46Apple AirTagIs he always losing something? An Apple AirTag may be the great gift you’re looking for. He can put it on his luggage, phone, keys, wallet—literally anything.14/46HydroFlaskWe fully believe that everyone’s life—or hydration levels, at least—can be improved with a HydroFlask. They come in a ton of colors and sizes, and all feature a spill-proof lid and built-in straw.15/46Base Camp Voyager Dopp KitKeep them looking good on the go with this simple and sleek dopp kit. Available in black/white or taupe green/black, the understated option with a two way zipper isn’t your father’s toiletry bag.16/46Set of 2 Whiskey GlassesGood whiskey needs a good glass. These hand-blown vessels feature interesting topographic impressions on the bottom, like Mount Kilimanjaro, Everest, and others.17/46Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker with Permanent FilterBelieve it or not, there are some people out there who aren’t completely engrained in a coffee-making routine. This simple pour-over coffee maker has a stainless steel mesh filter that doesn’t need to be swapped out between brews. It makes eight cups of coffee in one go, so you can invite yourself over for breakfast without feeling too guilty.18/46The Premium-Weight Relaxed Crew T-ShirtSimilar to the JanSport backpack, there’s no denying the power of a well-made T-shirt. This design from Everlane is made of heavyweight cotton and features a dropped shoulder, which gives the timeless look a bit of a modern refresh.19/46Lonrisway Small LED Wood Table LampSometimes a nightstand needs a well-designed LED light—we don’t make the rules. This one has five brightness levels built right in and is dimmable—perfect for mood lighting.20/46Create Your Own Reel ViewerThis is a wonderful option if they just came back from a life-changing trip or event. This DIY-ish set allows them to make a custom reel viewer (ohhh, vintage!) of their own photos. You can choose the color of the viewer, and there’s even a neat wooden design that could double as a design object.21/46Carter Wide MugSometimes the best gift is something they’ll use every day. This wide-mouth travel mug falls into that category. The 16-ounce vessel is available in over 10 colors and you can even add a personal engraving for $10 more. Nicknames, inside jokes, reminders—anything that will put a smile on their face.22/46Hamilton Beach Dual Breakfast Sandwich MakerIf you’re looking for a Father’s Day gift that you will also benefit from, you found it. This machine helps you go from “Wow, I’m hungry, I wish I had a custom breakfast sandwich” to eating said sandwich in five minutes.23/46Lodge 10.25-Inch Cast-Iron SkilletIf their favorite activities include searing, baking, broiling, or all of the above, this handy preseasoned cast-iron skillet will find a home in their kitchen. What’s even better is that it can be used in an oven, on a grill, over a campfire, and on the stove, of course.24/46National Park CandleIf they have a favorite national park, this scented candle will help them feel a little bit closer to a happy place even when they’re stuck at home. There are 17 parks to choose from, spanning Glacier National Park to Joshua Tree. Plus, the label design is the perfect blend of camp and trendy.25/46Dusen Dusen Pattern ShakersYour most design-forward friends will recognize the signature wiggle pattern on these shakers. Dusen Dusen is an NYC-based designer that makes the most playful home objects and accents. Plus their pieces are neutral enough that they’ll work in any style of home.26/46YETI Rambler Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated TumblerYes, we know there’s already a water bottle and a travel mug on this list, but Yeti designs some great options for keeping any kind of drink cold or hot whether they’re toting a chilled beer to the campfire, coffee on a road trip, or anything in between.27/46Peanut Butter SamplerWe all know that person who has an entire budget dedicated to peanut butter. They may not admit that, but the signs are there: spoonfuls of the good stuff sitting along the sink, empty jars rattling around in the recycling bin, the inability to eat sliced apples without a glob of peanut butter on each bite. Support their healthy protein intake with this set of six small-batch peanut butters.28/46Maxso Wine Chiller BucketThe best thing about this wine-chilling bucket is that you don’t need ice or a refrigerator to get things cooling (way) down. The stainless-steel bucket is double-walled with a vacuum-insulated design made to fit 750 milliliter wine and champagne bottles. Plus it’s easy to use: Just unscrew the adjustable top and it’s ready to go.29/469-in-1 Multi-tool PenThere are some gadgets that just look cool the moment they’re pulled out of a pocket or bag—extra points if they’re super functional, like this multi-tool pen. It’s an LED Light, ruler, bubble level, bottle opener, phone holder, stylus, ballpoint pen, and a two-head screwdriver.30/46Baggu Packing Cube SetFrequent travelers will always be delighted by a new set of packing cubes. It’s a simple gift, but one they’ll be thanking you for the next time they’re fitting provisions for a three-week trip into a single carry-on. We love the bold colors of this two-cube set from Baggu.31/46Himalayan Salt BBQ PlankFoodies and grilling enthusiasts will love the opportunity to test out a new tool. Hand-carved in Pakistan, this salt plank adds a subtle flavor to anything grilled on it while holding up great to hot temps. Remind whoever you’re gifting this to: Moist food absorbs more salt, while fattier foods repel it. It can also be used as a chic serving platter when it’s not in use on a grill.32/46Titleist 2021 Pro v1x 3Ball SleeveIf he loves golfing, chances are he’ll never say no to some extra golf balls.33/46Our Place Night + Day GlassesIf you’re looking for a welcome housewarming gift, a set of multiuse glasses in a fun color will get most parties started. These come in 10 different colors, including two sets that mix and match a number of hues.34/46The PairBrightland combined the power of two bestsellers—Rapture, a raw balsamic vinegar, and Parasol, a raw champagne vinegar—into one gift set. Those who spend hours trying out new recipes or anyone who loves a simple salad will get the most joy from this gift.35/46Belkin Wireless EarbudsAny music lover knows the importance of a solid pair of headphones. These water-resistant wireless earbuds charge up quickly and have a 38-hour play time between charges.36/46Carhartt Men's Knit Cuffed BeanieEvery single person needs a high-quality beanie. Not only is this one ultrafunctional during the winter months, but it’s also a cool transition accessory when the seasons start to switch. Plus Carhartt makes the best beanies that are available in a variety of colors.37/46Anker Portable Charger with Built-in Lightning ConnectorGive the gift of rechargeable power for their smartphone. This portable design from Anker is more compact than competitors, and the 12W output means it can charge your iPhone, iPad, and iPod quickly. It’s also available in six sleek color options to inject some personality.38/46 Personalized Golf Scorecard HolderBe the envy of the foursome with this scorecard holder in vegan leather that can be customized with up to 10 letters and numbers. Personalize it further with six color and four text color options.39/46Baltic Amber Jar CandleNotes of amber and vanilla orchid in this warm and spiced candle from Voluspa will fill a room for up to 100 hours without overpowering the space.40/46Ultimate Razor Burn & Bump ReliefMen have skin care needs too, so infuse his routine with aloe vera, willow herb extract, vitamin E, and other ingredients to handle irritation after shaving. The best part? It’s suitable for all skin types.41/46Normcore V4 Coffee TamperWhile it’s not uncommon for people to have home espresso machines nowadays, it is uncommon for those same machines to come with good tampers. Upgrade his gear with this spring loaded option for a perfectly level puck every time. Just be sure to get the right size.42/46Set of 3 JournalsWhether he likes journaling, planning, or making lists, a three pack of the Moleskine Cahier in one of six fun colors is just the ticket. Trust us, they just feel great to write in.43/46Calvin Klein Men's Cotton Classics 3-Pack Boxer BriefLet’s be honest: Whoever he is, he needs to update his underwear drawer (despite what he may tell you). Get a three-pack of one of the most comfortable pairs on the market available in neutral and more fun color options as well.44/46Triggerpoint Performance Therapy Foot RollerAnyone who spends time on their feet or hits the gym hard will thank you for this handy foot massager. Smaller in nature, it’s perfect to take on the go.45/46Turner Rubber SpatulaThis handy spatula is ideal for flipping flapjacks, eggs, or burgers from your stove top. Its versatile silicone head won't scratch your cookware but is still sturdy enough to scrape stubborn food bits from the pan.46/46Victorinox Swiss Army Classic SD Pocket KnifeWhat man doesn’t want to be handy? With seven functions, including blade, scissors, nail file, and tweezers, he’ll be just that. Lightweight and compact, it’s a perfect stocking stuffer for the camper or handyman in your life.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Believe it or not, it is possible to find unique gifts for men under $50. Whether he has expensive taste or an endless list of stocking stuffer requests during the holidays, we’ve rounded up a list of budget-friendly gifts that can speak to everything from his hobbies to sense of style. And most importantly, these presents are designed to make the guys in your life feel special—no matter the occasion.

What are some of our suggestions, you ask? We’ve included everything from cookware to help foodies nail their next recipe to beanies for all of his bad hair days. And as experts in all things home, we couldn’t help but add some gifts that design enthusiasts will appreciate, from vintage-inspired record players for traditionalists to sleek phone chargers that’ll fit in any modern home.

Remember: It really is the thought that counts, so know that any gift you shop with him in mind will make all the difference. So, skip the gift cards this season and put all of your confidence in being the person who always gives the cool gift. Here are our 47 favorite gifts for men under $50 to buy now.

  • 1/46

    Granitestone Nonstick Square Grill Pan

    Self-proclaimed grill masters can fine-tune their skills year round with the help of this grill pan. Its three layers of food-grade granite are manufactured to give the pan extra durability, while the mineral coating is made to keep his BBQ from sticking.

  • 2/46

    Made In Tabletop Coffee Mugs Red Rim (Four-Pack)

    Help him fill his cup (literally) with these durable coffee mugs. He can take in his morning brew with ease thanks to this stoneware set’s ergonomic handle for easy holding and stain- and chip-resistant design for lasting use.

  • 3/46

    Scotch Porter Conditioning Beard Balm and Beard Conditioner

    Our guess is that if he has a beard, he's constantly grooming it to keep it in its best shape. This balm and conditioner duo can help streamline the process with ingredients like aloe vera and marshmallow root formulated to keep the hair clean and hydrated.

  • 4/46

    Noah Unisex Core Logo Beanie

    Grant him the gift of effortless style every time he rocks this knit beanie. Available in a few bright and neutral colors, get it for the guy who can’t be bothered with a bad hair day.

  • 5/46

    TRUFF Hot Sauce and Hotter Sauce 2-Pack Bundle

    Spice up his life: Truff's hot and hotter sauces are filled with flavor and heat. With a mix between ripe red peppers and black truffle, this two-bottle gift set is the perfect sampler if he's looking to expand his condiment palate.

  • 6/46

    Cotsoco Vinyl Record Player

    Yes, we can listen to music on our phones, but there's nothing like the sound quality of vinyls on a record player. Gift a music lover with this vintage-inspired version, which also comes with bluetooth capabilities to stream music through its built-in speaker. Bonus: You can also browse Amazon's record store to shop vinyls from his favorite artists.

  • 7/46

    Ceylon Gel Body Wash

    You can’t beat the basics, and this body wash offers just that for his self-care routine. It features ingredients like lavender extracts that are formulated to gently clean his skin without drying it out.

  • 8/46

    Copper Cow Coffee Vietnamese Pour Over Coffee and Milk Creamer

    If your giftee already has his coffee rituals down, help them mix things up with this pack of pour-over coffee. They’ll receive a dose of three coffee flavors (classic, vanilla, and salted caramel) along with a pack of condensed milk creamers. And, hey, you might even turn them on to a new favorite.

  • 9/46

    Quince Italian Leather Money-Clip Wallet

    For the guy whose wallet is looking a little worse for wear, this practical, yet elevated gift will come in handy. This Italian leather wallet is designed to hold cash and up to eight credit cards with several front and internal pockets.

  • 10/46

    JBL Clip 3 Bluetooth Speaker

    This gadget is the perfect gift for the guy who has a playlist for everything: the shower, backyard hangs, reading sessions, and cooking dinner. A carabiner-style clip makes it easy to attach just about anywhere.

  • 11/46

    Foosball Bottle Opener Keychain

    There’s a good chance he’s played a (likely buzzed) game of foosball at some point in his life. This is one of those rare finds that’s good for gifting to someone you don’t know entirely well. After all, there’s never a bottle opener around when you really need one—and this is an adorable reinforcement.

  • 12/46

    Courant Catch:1 Wireless Charging Pad

    Wireless chargers are often clunky and, well, a little bit ugly. Courant has cracked the code when it comes to charging tech that looks as sleek as your iPhone. This particular design comes in eight colors, including three Belgian linen finishes and five leather options—though the latter will break your $50 budget by a bit.

  • 13/46

    Apple AirTag

    Is he always losing something? An Apple AirTag may be the great gift you’re looking for. He can put it on his luggage, phone, keys, wallet—literally anything.

  • 14/46

    HydroFlask

    We fully believe that everyone’s life—or hydration levels, at least—can be improved with a HydroFlask. They come in a ton of colors and sizes, and all feature a spill-proof lid and built-in straw.

  • 15/46

    Base Camp Voyager Dopp Kit

    Keep them looking good on the go with this simple and sleek dopp kit. Available in black/white or taupe green/black, the understated option with a two way zipper isn’t your father’s toiletry bag.

  • 16/46

    Set of 2 Whiskey Glasses

    Good whiskey needs a good glass. These hand-blown vessels feature interesting topographic impressions on the bottom, like Mount Kilimanjaro, Everest, and others.

  • 17/46

    Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker with Permanent Filter

    Believe it or not, there are some people out there who aren’t completely engrained in a coffee-making routine. This simple pour-over coffee maker has a stainless steel mesh filter that doesn’t need to be swapped out between brews. It makes eight cups of coffee in one go, so you can invite yourself over for breakfast without feeling too guilty.

  • 18/46

    The Premium-Weight Relaxed Crew T-Shirt

    Similar to the JanSport backpack, there’s no denying the power of a well-made T-shirt. This design from Everlane is made of heavyweight cotton and features a dropped shoulder, which gives the timeless look a bit of a modern refresh.

  • 19/46

    Lonrisway Small LED Wood Table Lamp

    Sometimes a nightstand needs a well-designed LED light—we don’t make the rules. This one has five brightness levels built right in and is dimmable—perfect for mood lighting.

  • 20/46

    Create Your Own Reel Viewer

    This is a wonderful option if they just came back from a life-changing trip or event. This DIY-ish set allows them to make a custom reel viewer (ohhh, vintage!) of their own photos. You can choose the color of the viewer, and there’s even a neat wooden design that could double as a design object.

  • 21/46

    Carter Wide Mug

    Sometimes the best gift is something they’ll use every day. This wide-mouth travel mug falls into that category. The 16-ounce vessel is available in over 10 colors and you can even add a personal engraving for $10 more. Nicknames, inside jokes, reminders—anything that will put a smile on their face.

  • 22/46

    Hamilton Beach Dual Breakfast Sandwich Maker

    If you’re looking for a Father’s Day gift that you will also benefit from, you found it. This machine helps you go from “Wow, I’m hungry, I wish I had a custom breakfast sandwich” to eating said sandwich in five minutes.

  • 23/46

    Lodge 10.25-Inch Cast-Iron Skillet

    If their favorite activities include searing, baking, broiling, or all of the above, this handy preseasoned cast-iron skillet will find a home in their kitchen. What’s even better is that it can be used in an oven, on a grill, over a campfire, and on the stove, of course.

  • 24/46

    National Park Candle

    If they have a favorite national park, this scented candle will help them feel a little bit closer to a happy place even when they’re stuck at home. There are 17 parks to choose from, spanning Glacier National Park to Joshua Tree. Plus, the label design is the perfect blend of camp and trendy.

  • 25/46

    Dusen Dusen Pattern Shakers

    Your most design-forward friends will recognize the signature wiggle pattern on these shakers. Dusen Dusen is an NYC-based designer that makes the most playful home objects and accents. Plus their pieces are neutral enough that they’ll work in any style of home.

  • 26/46

    YETI Rambler Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler

    Yes, we know there’s already a water bottle and a travel mug on this list, but Yeti designs some great options for keeping any kind of drink cold or hot whether they’re toting a chilled beer to the campfire, coffee on a road trip, or anything in between.

  • 27/46

    Peanut Butter Sampler

    We all know that person who has an entire budget dedicated to peanut butter. They may not admit that, but the signs are there: spoonfuls of the good stuff sitting along the sink, empty jars rattling around in the recycling bin, the inability to eat sliced apples without a glob of peanut butter on each bite. Support their healthy protein intake with this set of six small-batch peanut butters.

  • 28/46

    Maxso Wine Chiller Bucket

    The best thing about this wine-chilling bucket is that you don’t need ice or a refrigerator to get things cooling (way) down. The stainless-steel bucket is double-walled with a vacuum-insulated design made to fit 750 milliliter wine and champagne bottles. Plus it’s easy to use: Just unscrew the adjustable top and it’s ready to go.

  • 29/46

    9-in-1 Multi-tool Pen

    There are some gadgets that just look cool the moment they’re pulled out of a pocket or bag—extra points if they’re super functional, like this multi-tool pen. It’s an LED Light, ruler, bubble level, bottle opener, phone holder, stylus, ballpoint pen, and a two-head screwdriver.

  • 30/46

    Baggu Packing Cube Set

    Frequent travelers will always be delighted by a new set of packing cubes. It’s a simple gift, but one they’ll be thanking you for the next time they’re fitting provisions for a three-week trip into a single carry-on. We love the bold colors of this two-cube set from Baggu.

  • 31/46

    Himalayan Salt BBQ Plank

    Foodies and grilling enthusiasts will love the opportunity to test out a new tool. Hand-carved in Pakistan, this salt plank adds a subtle flavor to anything grilled on it while holding up great to hot temps. Remind whoever you’re gifting this to: Moist food absorbs more salt, while fattier foods repel it. It can also be used as a chic serving platter when it’s not in use on a grill.

  • 32/46

    Titleist 2021 Pro v1x 3Ball Sleeve

    If he loves golfing, chances are he’ll never say no to some extra golf balls.

  • 33/46

    Our Place Night + Day Glasses

    If you’re looking for a welcome housewarming gift, a set of multiuse glasses in a fun color will get most parties started. These come in 10 different colors, including two sets that mix and match a number of hues.

  • 34/46

    The Pair

    Brightland combined the power of two bestsellers—Rapture, a raw balsamic vinegar, and Parasol, a raw champagne vinegar—into one gift set. Those who spend hours trying out new recipes or anyone who loves a simple salad will get the most joy from this gift.

  • 35/46

    Belkin Wireless Earbuds

    Any music lover knows the importance of a solid pair of headphones. These water-resistant wireless earbuds charge up quickly and have a 38-hour play time between charges.

  • 36/46

    Carhartt Men's Knit Cuffed Beanie

    Every single person needs a high-quality beanie. Not only is this one ultrafunctional during the winter months, but it’s also a cool transition accessory when the seasons start to switch. Plus Carhartt makes the best beanies that are available in a variety of colors.

  • 37/46

    Anker Portable Charger with Built-in Lightning Connector

    Give the gift of rechargeable power for their smartphone. This portable design from Anker is more compact than competitors, and the 12W output means it can charge your iPhone, iPad, and iPod quickly. It’s also available in six sleek color options to inject some personality.

  • 38/46

    Personalized Golf Scorecard Holder

    Be the envy of the foursome with this scorecard holder in vegan leather that can be customized with up to 10 letters and numbers. Personalize it further with six color and four text color options.

  • 39/46

    Baltic Amber Jar Candle

    Notes of amber and vanilla orchid in this warm and spiced candle from Voluspa will fill a room for up to 100 hours without overpowering the space.

  • 40/46

    Ultimate Razor Burn & Bump Relief

    Men have skin care needs too, so infuse his routine with aloe vera, willow herb extract, vitamin E, and other ingredients to handle irritation after shaving. The best part? It’s suitable for all skin types.

  • 41/46

    Normcore V4 Coffee Tamper

    While it’s not uncommon for people to have home espresso machines nowadays, it is uncommon for those same machines to come with good tampers. Upgrade his gear with this spring loaded option for a perfectly level puck every time. Just be sure to get the right size.

  • 42/46

    Set of 3 Journals

    Whether he likes journaling, planning, or making lists, a three pack of the Moleskine Cahier in one of six fun colors is just the ticket. Trust us, they just feel great to write in.

  • 43/46

    Calvin Klein Men's Cotton Classics 3-Pack Boxer Brief

    Let’s be honest: Whoever he is, he needs to update his underwear drawer (despite what he may tell you). Get a three-pack of one of the most comfortable pairs on the market available in neutral and more fun color options as well.

  • 44/46

    Triggerpoint Performance Therapy Foot Roller

    Anyone who spends time on their feet or hits the gym hard will thank you for this handy foot massager. Smaller in nature, it’s perfect to take on the go.

  • 45/46

    Turner Rubber Spatula

    This handy spatula is ideal for flipping flapjacks, eggs, or burgers from your stove top. Its versatile silicone head won't scratch your cookware but is still sturdy enough to scrape stubborn food bits from the pan.

  • 46/46

    Victorinox Swiss Army Classic SD Pocket Knife

    What man doesn’t want to be handy? With seven functions, including blade, scissors, nail file, and tweezers, he’ll be just that. Lightweight and compact, it’s a perfect stocking stuffer for the camper or handyman in your life.
